channel.title: Help me
channel.description: can some one explain to me y the server keeps telling me to start a server... because i sit there and do it for about an hour and it gets annoying

oh my he just explained it… lol it means the srever is down, and click start server to run it. and if it doesnt work, like 93dcthugs93 said, get a newer java, or u might not have the newest moparscape

item.title: Help me

item.description:
@player10166 wrote:

how do u start playing if it keep saying error connecting to server plz help and tell me what to do step by step plz
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2007, 08:26:21 PM[/size][hr]can sombody plz help im getting very angry! ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh:::::::::::::::::::::::: : ( :?? :"P

Read full topic

item.title: Help me
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

If your getting an error saying “Error connecting to server, must be down. Click Start Server to make your own”.

That means you can make a temp. Server for yourself to play on. If you continue getting that error make sure you’ve filled in the correct port & you’ve made no mistakes in spelling.

If you made no mistakes or anything then you should update your Java.

Read full topic
